shibboleth.git

Class Cloner

  • java.lang.Object
    • shibboleth.git.Cloner

  • public class Cloner
extends java.lang.Object
    Clones remote Git repositories.
    Author:
    Wilco Wisse

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cloner(java.lang.String directory)
      Construct a cloner which clones repositories in a new sub directory of the given directory.
